page.title: 07A child's weekend
page.content:
On Saturday morning I go for a dancing lesson and sometimes to town afterwards.
This weekend I am going to my friend Kirsty's birthday party. She is having a barbeque, and later, when all the other children have gone, my Mum and Dad are coming and having a barbeque with Kirsty's Mum and Dad. We might go for a walk later if the weather is nice.
On Sunday we are having a picnic at the beach. We will go in the morning and spend the day at the beach. When we are ready we go home and I have a bath and wash my hair. I go to bed early on Sunday.
